## blade create process kill

Kill process

### Synopsis

Kill process by process id or process name

```
blade create process kill
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                 help for kill
      --process string       Process name
      --process-cmd string   Process name in command
      --timeout string       set timeout for experiment
```
